If you're interested in exploring a more thought-provoking film, "On Beauty" is another great choice. This movie follows fashion photographer Rick Guidotti as he challenges the industry's standard of beauty, featuring captivating visuals and profound themes.

This period drama follows a woman seeking passion and excitement in her life during the Reign of Terror. It's an engaging adaptation that beautifully captures Charles Dickens' novel.

Alternatively, if you're looking for something more modern with a unique storyline, you might enjoy "WALL·E." This animated film tells the tale of a waste-collecting robot who embarks on a space journey that could ultimately decide the fate of mankind. It's visually stunning and has a heartwarming message about environmentalism. Both films are sure to provide an interesting watch!

Another film worth mentioning is "Lady in the Water," directed by M. The tenants help protect her from dangerous creatures trying to keep her in our world. This film might appeal to you due to its enigmatic and thought-provoking narrative. Enjoy the movies!
